name: Magoosh LSAT Prep
description: Find answers to your questions about the LSAT and watch video lessons created by Magoosh experts here!  *Watch Logic Games, Logical Reasoning, and Reading Comprehension Tutorials*  Track your progress  16 video lessons for Trial  50+ video lessons for Premium  *Plan for your studying and quickly access top resources (available offline!)*  Select Your Study Schedules  Read Top Articles   Get Tutor Help  We hope you love it and that everything is easy to find, but if you run into trouble, feel free to email help@magoosh.com.  <3s and happy studying! ~ Magoosh === Customer satisfaction is incredibly important to us. If you have any questions or comments, please send us an email at support@magoosh.com or call 1-855-MAGOOSH and well get back to you as quickly as we can. If youre outside the US, you can also reach us at +1-510-214-0212  Dont wait until the last minute to start studying, let us be your study guide and download LSAT Prep from Magoosh today!
